extendedInfo.description: Stardust is an online multiplayer 3d space trading/combat RPG inspired by the classic 80's space trading/combat game ELITE.**PLEASE DO NOT RATE,***Please, Please use 'email developer', or email me at digitale001@gmail.com, I cant afford to buy 15 different phones to test on, so its really good to hear if you had problems. THIS IS AN ALPHA TEST APP. VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENTThe Alpha test currently has very limited functionality, and probably crashes, this app is intended for advanced users only.Please visit https://sites.google.com/site/digitaletec/ before playing, there is loads more info it's not possible to fit here.Very many thanks to everyone who's taken the time to test Stardust so far, even when it crashes on your phone I learn more (as long as you send the crash report). I hope you're enjoying seeing Stardust grow as the project progresses.Please note 3d load times can be very slow on some devices especially after hitting login or at the end of creating a new account, please be patient with black load screens, if music is playing, stuff is happening :) WI-FI strongly recommended, this is a very demanding app! Should I detect your network and stop the game if you are not on wifi? At the moment the game still tries to run on 3g, it probably will work okay on 4g. Mail me your thoughts!Privacy/security.Your email will be required to make an account, We will _never_ knowingly share your email with a 3rd party, or use it apart from Stardust related activities. All game networking is encrypted. No personal information is required to play.If you are having difficulties running the Android client there is also a PC/Apple/Linux client written in Java available from the Stardust website.There's some quick start help, available from the log-in screen, to find out how to play Stardust alpha-test. Though I do recommend going to the Stardust website first, this is as complex a game as World of Warcraft or any other MMO.Thanks to Brandon for pointing out my mail server is broken, registration works again.Do pop in and have a chat, I'm logged in game every day as [Game Master] Evile. The "Solar System" chat channel is probably the best one to use.Server version 31.a Level mechanics implemented.Tested on HTC Desire (2.3), HTC Desire (4.1 root), Archeos 10g (4.1), Windows XP, Ubuntu 11.10.
